H0.text: what was the alliance between great britian russia and france known as. The Allied Coalition

H1.text: what was the alliance between great britian russia and france known as. The European Accord

H2.text: what was the alliance between great britian russia and france known as. The Triple Alliance of Europe

H3.text: what was the alliance between great britian russia and france known as. The Triple Entente

A4.text: The Triple Entente (from French entente [ɑ̃tɑ̃t] meaning 'friendship, understanding, agreement') describes the informal mutual arrangement and understanding between the Russian Empire, the French Third Republic, and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland.

A5.text: It formed a powerful counterweight to the Triple Alliance of the German Empire, the Austro-Hungarian Empire, and the Kingdom of Italy.
